name: Ultra Repair¬Æ Cream Intense Hydration ‚Äì Face and Body Moisturizer for Skin Repair
about: What it is:A fast-absorbing, rich moisturizer that provides hydration for dry, distressed skin..Skin Type:Dry.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Redness.Formulation:Heavy Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, comes in recyclable packaging, and is reef safe..What Else You Need to Know:The award-winning Ultra Repair Cream delivers relief for parched skin, absorbing with no greasy after feel. It is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive. The cream is formulated with colloidal oatmeal to leave your skin feeling hydrated and comfortable..Clinical Results:In an independent clinical study with 21 participants:
ingredients: -Colloidal Oatmeal: Skin Protectant to relieve itching and minor irritation. ...Aqua (Water, Eau), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Colloidal Oatmeal, Squalane, Ceramide NP, Allantoin, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to face and/or body at least twice daily or as needed to restore and soothe dry, uncomfortable skin.

reviews.review_title: !!!IT WILL DESTROY YOUR SKIN!!! Be aware!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this moisture because I have very dry skin in winter and normal in summer. I have been using it for about 2 and a half weeks. 2 weeks it was okk, I liked the texture but beside that nothing much. However from last couple of days my skin has been sooo dry and burning. I have having hard time pin point what‚Äôs going on. I kinda had feel that it was this moisture and tonight it‚Äôs confirmed, as soon as I put is moisture on tonight MY SKIM BURNED LIKE IT WAS ON FIRE!!! This moisture only thing that was changed my skincare routine. It has completely damaged my skin barrier, I have so much dullness, redness, rash like little bumps and actually pain on my cheeks, upper lip and forehead. I‚Äôm scared that I have discoloration from this now and I been taking care of my skin forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny! The best lotion I‚Äôve ever experienced! I purchased the mini one just to try. After the first use I came back to purchase the largest size. I will be keeping the mini my purse. Although I do not need it because it literally keeps you hydrated and soft all day and night long.

reviews.review_title: Started great, but now it burns
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product in 2020 - for several years it was my go to; no pilling, seemed to calm my redness, absorbed well, and plenty of product. HOWEVER, in the last 6ish months, my face started to burn when applying this, despite no change in my routine at all. I would end up with red, flaky almost-blisters on my eyelids, under my eyes, and around my nose if any of the cream got on there. I looked into it, and this has eucalyptus oil in it, which over time will break down your skin barrier, and once that's gone, will irritate the hell out of your skin. If I could go back I would maybe look at only applying it once a day, not as a morning and evening moisturizer, or if you already have sensitive skin, this is not as soothing as you might like.
My favorite moisturizer. I am on my way to order the second one.  Very light texture and does not leave a greasy feeling. Suitable as a base for make-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The combination of emollients in this lotion makes for a great application, feel, and absorption. The colloidal oatmeal promotes healing and reduces inflammation while also promoting collagen, elastin etc. i have been using this moisturizer for years and wont be changing anytime soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just LOVE this product. I used it before for 2 to 3 months and then i changed my moisturizer. But again, i end up at this product because its unbeatable. It brightens my skin within 1 week
This gave me tiny red bumps all over my face and almost felt like it just sat on my skin instead of absorbing. Not for sensitive skin whatsoever.

reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this as my skin has been so dry this winter, but it broke me out in dozens of little pimples each time I used it. Super disappointed in this. With my experience it‚Äôs not safe for acne prone skin sensitive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great lotion, got a sample size and fell in love with this I have very sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer in the world.  I buy the big jars all the time.  I have tubes in my purse and in my car.  When we have butter cold winters, I use this on my face as well.  I always buy unscented.  My sensitive skin loves this!  I will never use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing & perfect for sensitive skin. Keeps the redness at-bay

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband swears by this, uses it on driest parts of body - hands, knees, etc. I should probably tell him face is also an option. Not the cheapest, but fortunately often goes on sale.

reviews.review_title: Not the formula she used to be
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was reformulated a few years ago. I had only ever tried the old formula, but decided to grab a bottle of this on sale recently. Unfortunately, the new formula is entirely ineffective. It feels soothing for a minute when you first put it on, but after it dries down the skin is still parched and itchy. Even piling it on doesn‚Äôt work. I‚Äôm sure this would be a fine for the rest of the year, but this is doing absolutely nothing for me in this dry winter weather when I need it the most.

reviews.review_title: Formula has changed, sensitive skin beware
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is sensitive, very dry in winter, and combo to dry in warmer days. I experienced redness and dryness quite frequently. FAB ultra repair cream has been my go-to product for years, and I always come back to this one after trying new moisturizers. It provides me with enough hydration and helps me with redness significantly; my skin has also become less sensitive over the years (I experienced less frequent breakouts).  However, the formula change has completely ruined this product! The last time I bought this, it made me break out like crazy; it caused severe redness and burning all over my skin, and my skin still burns when I use other moisturizers that don't make me break out. I looked up the ingredient lists. They added eucalyptus oil extract, which can irritate sensitive skin. FAB please fix the formula and make it sensitive skin safe since the brand is advised for people with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was in the search for a moisturizer that would REALLY hydrate my face for the winter, and this is the one! I felt like treating myself when I bought it because it was a bit expensive, but, in all honesty a little goes a long way for this product. lo
This product feels nice on the skin but made my rosacea burn and flare. Maybe not for sensitive skin. Nice texture, wish it worked for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not joking. this is probably my favorite product ever! My skin is overall been so much smoother and softer! ladies, don't walk run!

reviews.review_text: This product surprised me with how good it was, I thought it thinking I‚Äôd use it as a body cream as I live in the North and we dry, but after trying it I knew it was going to be my go to daily moisturizer for winter. Super impressed with how moisturizing while not greasy it is. I have sensitive skin and it‚Äôs been magic to me .
The hydration thing is ok but the smell is so bad and its hurting on my skin, its my 3rd day of using it but its making my skin red and irritated. I cant use it now.

I have sensitive very dry postpartum 30s skin. was recommended this product to help repair my moisture barrier.... this stuff BURNED when I first put it on my face. My face flushed red and became very hot. I let it sit but eventually rewashed my face because it was bugging me. Tried it a couple more times and had the same results sadly. 2 stars because it works OK on the rest of my body. There is better out there.

reviews.review_text: This is my absolute FAVORITE lotion. I tell everyone about it. I have very dry skin as well as psoriasis. This doesn‚Äôt sting, burn or irritate and it moisturizes without being greasy. I can‚Äôt love it enough. I always stick up when it goes on sale.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my routine - beware of shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne-prone, combination skin and this cream has really helped me restore moisture in my skin without feeling oily or greasy. However, for some reason I look very shiny after I apply it -  To tbe point where I feel like I need to powder or people will stare at me. So I love it but be aware tht you wil‚Äô look slightly shiny after you apply it. It feels great though and it is really affordable, especially if you get it in sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for years as a nighttime moisturizer. I have dry/combo skin that gets super dry in the winter (especially using tretinoin) and this moisturizer savesssss my skin. Not too heavy for the summer months and just perfect for winter. I recommend this product to all of my friends and stock up every time there‚Äôs a sale!!

I bought this product late October and wanted to test it out before reviewing. It‚Äôs been about a month of using this product, and I LOVE IT. I bought the 2 oz. for a trial run, and best believe I am adding the biggest size on my wish list for Christmas. Keep in mind, I wash my face at night once a day. I apply the cream as my last step and every morning, when I wake up and I feel my face, my skin is so soft and smooth. Compared to my previous moisturizer, my skin feels different‚Äîin a positive way! Every skin type is different so this may not work for you. I have normal-to dry skin, and prior to putting this on I also put on toner and two serums. So those factors may change your own outcome. I know this is a very long review, but personally, I would want a review that reflects a truthful opinion on a product! Thank you First Aid Beauty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry skin due to lupus, and this product didn't do anything to help the dryness. It smells nice and it feels very smooth, but it didn't really fulfill my needs as a facial moisturizer.

reviews.review_text: I love this product! In the winter it helps my dry skin. It‚Äôs perfect for winter and summer.

On the body, it sits on the skin and does not provide last hydration. As someone with dry skin, particularly in the winter, I always find my skin drier after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really helps reduce the wrinkles around my eyes after using over half of 6oz. Even though it‚Äôs heavy and doesn‚Äôt absorb easily into the skin, I‚Äôll still buy it. I believe i need it in the dry winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the 2oz size for awhile as I order it as part of a FAB kit. I absolutely love what it does for my sensitive, rosacea prone skin.  However, I decided to order the 8oz tube and right from the first use I felt a burning sensation on my skin and it turned red.  The next day I had large red bumps that were painful to touch. It's so strange. I returned the 8oz and ordered a 2oz and all went back to normal in a day or so.  It definitely seems that there is a difference in formulation between the sizes. I will stick with the 2oz tube.

reviews.review_title: Works better as a body lotion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so I bought this in preparation for the coming weather changes. It leaves a film on your face that‚Äôs unpleasant, even hours after applying. After a couple of weeks of using this as a night time moisturizer I‚Äôve noticed oiliness and skin congestion. I‚Äôve had multiple zits and my pores are more apparent. Nothing else in my routine has changed, and it takes A LOT for my skin to feel oily. I‚Äôll have to use the rest of this as a body lotion and keep looking.
This is a great product. I had some areas that were slow to heal and this really helped

reviews.review_title: Feels like a generic drugstore body lotion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Despite the raving reviews, I felt compelled to share my experience with this product because I strongly feel that this product is akin to a drugstore lotion being passed off as a high end skin product. 1. It does not have a nice light wet texture like a good facial moisturizer should. 2. does not dissolve into the skin but rather feels like a heavy film once on. 3. smells like a drugstore product. 4. feels like a body lotion and NOT a something to be applied to the face. 5. the price, what?? I dont have sensitive or special requirements for my skin and I'm not one that is particularly picky with my skin care, but I dont understand how this can work for anyone. It may be ok if you've never tried other moisturizing products to compare, but out of all the sephora moisturizers I have tried, this falls at the last of my list. I think it could work as a body moisturizer but certainly not for the face.

reviews.review_text: I purchased this moisturizer based on a reccomendation of a youtuber I enjoy watching and have been using it for the past few weeks. In the beginning, it was great! I had no real issues and it really helped moisturize the dry skin around my mouth and nose. About a week in, I noticed that my pores were very clogged and whenever I applied the moisturizer too close to my eyes, they would burn and I would start crying. I think my skin is just really sensitive to essential oils so this moisturizer isn't compatible with my face. I'll continue to use this moisturizer on my body because it is less sensitive but I won't be repurchasing because it didn't really work out for me. If you don't have sensitive skin, this may be a good fit for you!
